US businesses' fears range from outright piracy of their goods to the transfer of technological know-how that can be inevitable in joint ventures with Chinese companies. Sometimes Beijing mandates that foreign firms share technology, locate R&D in China and so forth, and the U.S. business community sees that as tying their hands when they go to China, said Kevin Gallagher , professor of international relations at Boston University. " Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson .
